title: Low Priority Queue keeps refreshing...
body:
Hey there,
I got a question about low priority queue. 

I have waited 18 min, because I have a low priority queue of 20min. But when my timer says 12 min remaining, the timer resets itself to 20 min... 
Picture: http://prntscr.com/hc19nn
First I thought that this was a bugg so I left queue en rejoined it, I waited till 12 min remaining and the timer reset itself again to 20min...

Then I restarted my game and tried it again, without any succession...

Now I have waited 24 min and I need to wait 10 more minute's to start my game..
Picture: http://prntscr.com/hc1be1

Can someone explain to why?

replies.body:
This could happen if you're having connection issues that's causing you to lose comms with matchmaking while waiting to queue.  Leaverbuster is good at catching what could otherwise have been another leave, so it may be a good idea to stick to customs for now and troubleshoot this.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which should fix this up.  You also have 3 games left of [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), so you'll see the lower priority queue for a few more matches.

While you troubleshoot, I've created a ticket for you as well.  This will allow our tech team to work with you directly and see if there's anything else going on, of we can do something for you.  Your ticket number is #32667721.  We'll get back to you there as soon as we can.  :)

Drop the shittalk, if you fail to accept you have to press start again, this system is dead and stupid and you know it. Same happen to me today and i had to give up after 1 hour of refreshing.
